name: slowbronite
effect: Held: Allows Slowbro to Mega Evolve into Mega Slowbro.
short_effect: Held: Allows Slowbro to Mega Evolve into Mega Slowbro.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Slowbro hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:

Have Slowbro hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.
